title: Compilation: il bruco the apple worm
brief_description: Three animated films by Bruno Bozzetto. “The Apple worm”: A humorous look at the troubles of an apple worm. “The Swimming pool”: A man who looks forward to using his new swimming pool is thwarted at every turn. “Self service”: A satirical cartoon about a group of enterprising mosquitoes.
